device42_base_url.description: Please enter your Device42 URL eg. http://192.168.92.130:8000

device42_cloud_connector_url.description: Please enter the Device42 Cloud Connector address that you would like to use  URL eg. connect.device42.net (US), connect-eu.device42.net (EU)

device42_verification_token.description: Please enter your Device42 Auth Token
